markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 9" pfs="Standard">
[Empty Body](/Spells.aspx?ID=483)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 401 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You turn ethereal, with the effects of [_ethereal jaunt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=105), but you don't need to concentrate.
name: Empty Body
